an9.62:4.1: “Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an9.62:4.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ—
an9.62:4.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an9.62:5.1: Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an9.62:5.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ—
an9.62:5.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
